title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3907/92 of 19 December 1992 establishing, for 1993, certain measures for the conservation and management of fishery resources, applicable to vessels flying the flag of a Member State, other than Spain and Portugal, in waters falling under the sovereignty or within the jurisdiction of the Portuguese Republic
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) N° 3907/92 of 19  December 1992 fixing, for 1993, certain measures for the conservation and management of fishery  resources, applicable to vessels flying the flag of a Member State, other than Spain and Portugal,  in waters falling under the sovereignty or within the jurisdiction of the Portuguese Republic
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The number of vessels flying the flag of a Member State other than  Spain and Portugal, authorized to fish in waters falling under the sovereignty or within the  jurisdiction of the Portuguese Republic, as provided for in Article 351 of the Act of Accession and  the procedures for access, shall be as set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1993.
It shall apply until 31 December 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1992.
For the Council The President J. GUMMER
(1) OJ N° L 207, 29. 7. 1987, p. 1. Regulation as amended by Regulation (EEC)  N° 3483/88 (OJ N° L 306, 11. 11. 1988, p. 2).
ANNEX
>TABLE>
